title: Account recovery pls help
body: Hey guys Iâ€™ve need to resort to making a new account due to my losing access to my old email and phone that was connected to my old account, is there anyway to recover an account wth nothing but the user name, and verifications from friends that played the game along side me in person?

replies.body: You'll need to go through the account verification as usual, but those questions shouldn't be too difficult for you if you've played consistently on the account! Reach out to those account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the "I need help recovering my account" ticket option!
